pyzui.osmtileprovider module¶

Dynamic tile provider for OpenStreetMap.

class pyzui.osmtileprovider.OSMTileProvider(tilecache)[source]¶

Bases: DynamicTileProvider

OSMTileProvider objects are used for downloading tiles from OpenStreetMap (<http://openstreetmap.org/>).

Constructor: OSMTileProvider(TileCache)

Create a new TileProvider for loading tiles into the given tilecache.

filext = 'png'¶
tilesize = 256¶
aspect_ratio = 1.0¶
_load_dynamic(tile_id, outfile)[source]¶

Perform whatever actions necessary to load the tile identified by the given tile_id into the location given by outfile.

_load_dynamic(tuple<string,int,int,int>, string)
